root.Summary: 1: Shain AH, Garrido M, Botton T, Talevich E, Yeh I, Sanborn JZ, Chung J, WangNJ, Kakavand H, Mann GJ, Thompson JF, Wiesner T, Roy R, Olshen AB, Gagnon A, GrayJW, Huh N, Hur JS, Busam KJ, Scolyer RA, Cho RJ, Murali R, Bastian BC. Exomesequencing of desmoplastic melanoma identifies recurrent NFKBIE promotermutations and diverse activating mutations in the MAPK pathway. Nat Genet. 2015Oct;47(10):1194-9. doi: 10.1038/ng.3382. Epub 2015 Sep 7. PubMed PMID: 26343386; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC4589486.
